price: নিশ্চয় দিনৰ ভাগত তোমাৰ বাবে আছে দীৰ্ঘ কৰ্মব্যস্ততা।
arabic: إِنَّ لَكَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ سَبۡحٗا طَوِيلٗا

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: inna laka fī al-nahāri sabḥan ṭawīlan
